00062     {
00063         global $TmpFile, $Re_Ip;
00064         
00065         parent::Model();
00066         
00067         $this->StartCmd= "/usr/local/sbin/dansguardian > $TmpFile 2>&1 &";

00069         $this->re_DgNet= "$Re_Ip\/$Re_Ip";
00070         $this->re_DgRange= "$Re_Ip-$Re_Ip";
00071

00073                 'exceptionlist' => 'exceptioniplist',

00075             );

00269 
00270     function GetConfFile($confname, $group)
00271     {
00272         if ($confname === 'GeneraldownloadsConfig') {
00273             $file= $this->confDir.'downloadmanagers/fancy.conf';
00274         }
00275         else if ($confname == 'blanketConfig') {
00276             $file= $this->GetGroupFile($group, 'sites', 'banned');
00277         }
00278         else if (preg_match('/^General.*Config$/', $confname)) {
00279             $file= $this->ConfFile;
00280         }
00281         else {
00282             $file= $this->confDir.'dansguardianf'.$group.'.conf';
00283         }
00284         return $file;
00285     }
00286 
00287     function SetConfig($confname)
00288     {
00289         global $GeneralbasicConfig, $GeneralfilterConfig, $GeneralscanConfig, $GenerallogsConfig, $GeneraldownloadsConfig, $GeneraladvancedConfig,
00290             $blanketConfig, $basicConfig, $scanConfig, $bypassConfig, $emailConfig;
00291         
00292         if ($confname !== '') {
00293             $this->Config= ${$confname};
00294         }
00295     }
00296 
00299     function GetAuthIpList($list)
00300     {
00301         if ($filepath= $this->GetListFilePath($list)) {
00302             return $this->GetIps($filepath);
00303         }
00304         return FALSE;
00305     }
00306 
00312     function GetIps($file)
00313     {
00314         global $Re_Ip;
00315 
00316         return $this->SearchFileAll($file, "/^\h*($Re_Ip|$this->re_DgNet|$this->re_DgRange)\b\h*(|$this->COMC.*)$/m");
00317     }
00318 
00319     function AddIp($list, $ip)
00320     {
00321         if ($filepath= $this->GetListFilePath($list)) {
00322             $this->DelIp($list, $ip);
00323             return $this->AppendToFile($filepath, $ip);
00324         }
00325         return FALSE;
00326     }
00327 
00328     function DelIp($list, $ip)
00329     {
00330         if ($filepath= $this->GetListFilePath($list)) {
00331             $ip= Escape($ip, '/.');
00332             return $this->ReplaceRegexp($filepath, "/^(\h*$ip\b.*(\s|))/m", '');
00333         }
00334         return FALSE;
00335     }
00336 
00337     function GetListFilePath($list)
00338     {
00339         if ($filepath= $this->GetFilterConfFilePath($this->confDir.'dansguardian.conf', $this->ipLists[$list])) {
00340             return $filepath;
00341         }
00342         else {
00343             ViewError(_('Cannot read config').": $list");
00344         }
00345         return FALSE;
00346     }
00347 
00348     function AddSiteList($file, $site)
00349     {
00350         $this->DelSiteList($file, $site);
00351         return $this->AppendToFile($file, $site);
00352     }
00353 
00354     function AddUrlList($file, $url)
00355     {
00356         $this->DelUrlList($file, $url);
00357         return $this->AppendToFile($file, $url);
00358     }

00360     function DisableExtMime($group, $list, $type, $item)
00361     {
00362         if (($groupfile= $this->GetGroupFile($group, $list, $type)) !== FALSE) {
00363             return $this->DisableExt($groupfile, $item);
00364         }
00365         return FALSE;
00366     }
00367 
00368     function DisableExt($file, $ext)
00369     {
00370         $ext= Escape($ext, './');
00371         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($file, "/^(\h*$ext(\h*$this->COMC.*|\h*))$/m", $this->COMC.'${1}');
00372     }
00373 
00374     function EnableExtMime($group, $list, $type, $item)
00375     {
00376         if (($groupfile= $this->GetGroupFile($group, $list, $type)) !== FALSE) {
00377             return $this->EnableExt($groupfile, $item);
00378         }
00379         return FALSE;
00380     }
00381 
00382     function EnableExt($file, $ext)
00383     {
00384         $ext= Escape($ext, './');
00385         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($file, "/^\h*$this->COMC(\h*$ext(\h*$this->COMC.*|\h*))$/m", '${1}');
00386     }
00387 
00388     function AddExt($file, $ext, $cmt)
00389     {
00390         $this->DelExt($file, $ext);
00391         return $this->AppendToFile($file, "$ext $this->COMC $cmt");
00392     }
00393 
00394     function DelExt($file, $ext)
00395     {
00396         // Both extensions and mime types are deleted by this method
00397         $ext= Escape($ext, './');
00398         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($file, "/^(\h*($this->COMC\h*|)$ext\b.*(\s|))/m", '');
00399     }
00400

00402     {
00403         $site= Escape($site, '/.');
00404         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($file, "/^(\h*$site\b.*(\s|))/m", '');
00405     }

00410         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($file, "/^(\h*$url\b.*(\s|))/m", '');
00411     }

00422     function GetCats($file, $cat= '[^#\s]+', $subcat= '[^#\s]+')
00423     {
00424         return $this->SearchFileAll($file, "/^\h*\.Include.*lists\/($cat\/$subcat)>.*$/m");
00425     }

00449 
00456     function GetSiteList($file, $site= '[^.#\s]+[^\s]*')
00457     {
00458         $site= Escape($site, '/.');
00459         return $this->SearchFileAll($file, "/^\h*($site)\b.*\v*$/m");
00460     }
00461 
00464     function GetUrlList($file, $url= '[^.#\s]+[^\s]*')
00465     {
00466         $url= Escape($url, '/.');
00467         return $this->SearchFileAll($file, "/^\h*($url)\b.*\v*$/m");
00468     }
00469 
00475     function GetExts($file)
00476     {
00477         $re_ext= '\.[a-z0-9A-Z][a-z0-9A-Z_.]{0,10}';
00478         $re_mime= '[a-zA-Z][a-z0-9A-Z_-]{0,20}\/[a-z0-9A-Z_.-]{0,20}';
00479         
00480         $result= array();
00481 
00482         $contents= file_get_contents($file);
00483         
00484         $re= "($re_ext|$re_mime)\b\h*(|$this->COMC.*)";
00485         if (preg_match_all("/^\h*($re)$/m", $contents, $match)) {
00486             $output= array_values($match[1]);
00487             foreach ($output as $line) {
00488                 if (preg_match("/^$re$/", $line, $match)) {
00489                     $result[$match[1]]= array(
00490                         'Comment'   => $match[2],
00491                         'Enabled'   => TRUE,
00492                     );
00493                 }
00494             }
00495         }
00496         
00497         if (preg_match_all("/^\h*$this->COMC\h*($re)$/m", $contents, $match)) {
00498             $output= array_values($match[1]);
00499             foreach ($output as $line) {
00500                 if (preg_match("/^$re$/", $line, $match)) {
00501                     $result[$match[1]]= array(
00502                         'Comment'   => $match[2],
00503                         'Enabled'   => FALSE,
00504                     );
00505                 }
00506             }
00507         }
00508         return serialize($result);
00509     }
00510 
00513     function GetFuncCats($func, $group, $list, $type)
00514     {
00515         if (($groupfile= $this->GetGroupFile($group, $list, $type)) !== FALSE) {
00516             if (($output= $this->$func($groupfile)) !== FALSE) {
00517                 return $output;
00518             }
00519             else {
00520                 return '';
00521             }
00522         }
00523         return FALSE;
00524     }
00525

00538     function FuncTurnCats($func, $group, $list, $type, $cat, $subcat)
00539     {
00540         if (($groupfile= $this->GetGroupFile($group, $list, $type)) !== FALSE) {
00541             if (($output= $this->$func($groupfile, $cat, $subcat)) !== FALSE) {
00542                 return $output;
00543             }
00544             else {
00545                 return '';
00546             }
00547         }
00548         return FALSE;
00549     }

00557     function TurnOnCat($file, $cat, $subcat= '[^#\s]+')
00558     {
00560         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($file, "/^\h*$this->COMC(\s*\.Include.*lists\/$cat\/$subcat>.*)$/m", '${1}');
00561     }

00570     {
00572         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($file, "/^(\h*\.Include.*lists\/$cat\/$subcat>.*)$/m", $this->COMC.'${1}');
00573     }

00648     function GetGroupIpList($group)

00662     function GetGrpIps($file, $group= '[^#\s]+')
00663     {
00664         global $Re_Ip;
00665 
00666         return $this->SearchFileAll($file, "/^\h*($Re_Ip|$this->re_DgNet|$this->re_DgRange)\h*$this->NVPS\h*filter$group\b\h*(|$this->COMC.*)$/m");
00667     }
00668 
00671     function GetIpgroupsFilePath()
00672     {
00673         if ($conffile= $this->GetFilterConfFilePath($this->confDir.'dansguardian.conf', 'authplugin')) {
00674             if ($filepath= $this->GetFilterConfFilePath($conffile, 'ipgroups')) {
00675                 return $filepath;
00676             }
00677             else {
00678                 ViewError(_('Cannot read config').': ipgroups');
00679             }
00680         }
00681         else {
00682             ViewError(_('Cannot read config').': authplugin');
00683         }
00684         return FALSE;
00685     }
00686 
00693     function SetIpFilterGrp($group, $ip)
00694     {
00695         if ($file= $this->GetIpgroupsFilePath()) {
00696             $this->DelIpFilterGrp($ip, $group);
00697             $this->DelIpFilterGrp($ip, '.*');
00698             return $this->AppendToFile($file, "$ip = filter$group");
00699         }
00700         return FALSE;
00701     }
00702 
00708     function DelIpFilterGrp($ip, $group= '[^#\s]+')
00709     {
00710         if ($file= $this->GetIpgroupsFilePath()) {
00711             $ip= Escape($ip, '/.');
00712             return $this->ReplaceRegexp($file, "/^(\h*$ip\b\h*$this->NVPS\h*filter$group\b\h*.*(\s|))/m", '');
00713         }
00714         return FALSE;
00715     }
00716 
00717     function GetGroupFile($group, $list, $type)
00718     {
00719         $metafile= $this->GetMetaFile($group, $list);
00720 
00721         $filename= $this->listConfig[$list][$type];
00722         if (($groupfile= $this->GetFilterConfFilePath($metafile, $filename)) !== FALSE) {
00723             return $groupfile;
00724         }
00725         ViewError(_('Cannot find group configuration file').": $type $list");
00726         return FALSE;
00727     }
00728 
00737     function GetMetaFile($group, $list)
00738     {
00739         if (isset($this->listConfig[$list]['MetaConfigFile'])) {
00740             $metafile= $this->listConfig[$list]['MetaConfigFile'];
00741         }
00742         else {
00743             $metafile= $this->confDir.'dansguardianf'.$group.'.conf';
00744         }
00745         return $metafile;
00746     }
00747 
00750     function GetGroupCount()
00751     {
00752         return $this->GetNVP($this->confDir.'dansguardian.conf', 'filtergroups');
00753     }
00754 
00757     function GroupExists($group)
00758     {
00759         return file_exists($this->confDir.'dansguardianf'.$group.'.conf');
00760     }

00773     function CreateNewGroup($group)
00774     {
00775         $filenames= array(
00776             'bannedphraselist',
00777             'weightedphraselist',
00778             'exceptionphraselist',
00779             'bannedsitelist',
00780             'greysitelist',
00781             'exceptionsitelist',
00782             'bannedurllist',
00783             'greyurllist',
00784             'exceptionurllist',
00785             //'exceptionregexpurllist',
00786             //'bannedregexpurllist',
00787             //'picsfile',
00788             //'contentregexplist',
00789             //'urlregexplist',
00790             'bannedextensionlist',
00791             'bannedmimetypelist',
00792             'exceptionfilesitelist',
00793             'exceptionfileurllist',
00794             //'headerregexplist',
00795             //'bannedregexpheaderlist'
00796             );
00797 
00798         $result= TRUE;
00799         $fatal= FALSE;
00800         $info= "GetNVP: $this->ConfFile: filtergroups";
00801         if (($output= $this->GetNVP($this->ConfFile, 'filtergroups')) !== FALSE) {
00802             ViewError(_('SUCCESS').": $info");
00803             cwc_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "SUCCESS: $info");
00804 
00805             $newgroup= $output + 1;
00806 
00807             $conffile= $this->confDir."dansguardianf$group.conf";
00808             $newconffile= $this->confDir."dansguardianf$newgroup.conf";
00809 
00810             $info= 'File exists check: '.$newconffile;
00811             if (!file_exists($newconffile)) {
00812                 ViewError(_('SUCCESS').": $info");
00813                 cwc_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "SUCCESS: $info");
00814 
00815                 $info= "File copy: $conffile $newconffile";
00816                 exec("/bin/cp -p $conffile $newconffile 2>&1", $output, $retval);
00817                 if ($retval === 0) {
00818                     ViewError(_('SUCCESS').": $info");
00819                     cwc_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "SUCCESS: $info");
00820 
00821                     foreach ($filenames as $Name) {
00822                         $info= "GetNVP: $conffile: $Name";
00823                         if (($output= $this->GetNVP($conffile, $Name)) !== FALSE) {
00824                             ViewError(_('SUCCESS').": $info");
00825                             cwc_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "SUCCESS: $info");
00826 
00827                             $groupfile= rtrim(trim($output, "'"), $group);
00828                             $newgroupfile= $groupfile.$newgroup;
00829 
00830                             $info= "File exists check: $newgroupfile";
00831                             if (!file_exists($newgroupfile)) {
00832                                 ViewError(_('SUCCESS').": $info");
00833                                 cwc_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "SUCCESS: $info");
00834 
00835                                 $info= "File copy: $groupfile $newgroupfile";
00836                                 exec("/bin/cp -p $groupfile $newgroupfile 2>&1", $output, $retval);
00837                                 if ($retval === 0) {
00838                                     ViewError(_('SUCCESS').": $info");
00839                                     cwc_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "SUCCESS: $info");
00840 
00841                                     $info= "SetNVP: $newconffile: $Name= $newgroupfile";
00842                                     if ($this->SetNVP($newconffile, $Name, "'$newgroupfile'")) {
00843                                         ViewError(_('SUCCESS').": $info");
00844                                         cwc_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "SUCCESS: $info");
00845                                     }
00846                                     else {
00847                                         $result= FALSE;
00848                                         $fatal= TRUE;
00849                                         ViewError(_('FAILED').": $info");
00850                                         cwc_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "FAILED: $info");
00851                                     }
00852                                 }
00853                                 else {
00854                                     $result= FALSE;
00855                                     $fatal= TRUE;
00856                                     ViewError(_('FAILED').": $info ".implode("\n", $output));
00857                                     cwc_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "FAILED: $info ".implode("\n", $output));
00858                                 }
00859                             }
00860                             else {
00861                                 $result= FALSE;
00862                                 ViewError(_('FAILED').": $info");
00863                                 cwc_syslog(LOG_WARNING, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "FAILED: $info");
00864                             }
00865                         }
00866                         else {
00867                             $result= FALSE;
00868                             ViewError(_('FAILED').": $info");
00869                             cwc_syslog(LOG_WARNING, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "FAILED: $info");
00870                         }
00871                     }
00872                 }
00873                 else {
00874                     $result= FALSE;
00875                     $fatal= TRUE;
00876                     ViewError(_('FAILED').": $info ".implode("\n", $output));
00877                     cwc_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "FAILED: $info ".implode("\n", $output));
00878                 }
00879             }
00880             else {
00881                 $result= FALSE;
00882                 $error= _('FAILED').": $info";
00883                 ViewError(_('FAILED').": $info");
00884                 cwc_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "FAILED: $info");
00885             }
00886         }
00887         else {
00888             $result= FALSE;
00889             $fatal= TRUE;
00890             ViewError(_('FAILED').": $info");
00891             cwc_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "FAILED: $info");
00892         }
00893 
00894         if (!$fatal) {
00895             $info= "SetNVP: $this->ConfFile: filtergroups $newgroup";
00896             if ($this->SetNVP($this->ConfFile, 'filtergroups', $newgroup)) {
00897                     ViewError(_('SUCCESS').": $info");
00898                     cwc_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "SUCCESS: $info");
00899             }
00900             else {
00901                 $result= FALSE;
00902                 $fatal= TRUE;
00903                 ViewError(_('FAILED').": $info");
00904                 cwc_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "FAILED: $info");
00905             }
00906 
00907             if (!$result) {
00908                 ViewError("\n"._("One or more actions failed while creating new group\nExamine the report above to make sure this is the intended result!"));
00909             }
00910             else {
00911                 ViewError("\n"._('Group created successfully').": $newgroup");
00912             }
00913         }
00914 
00915         if ($fatal) {
00916             ViewError("\n"._('FATAL ERRORS in creating new group'));
00917         }
00918         return !$fatal && $result;
00919     }
00920 
00925     function SetTemplateIps($ip)
00926     {
00927         global $Re_Ip;
00928         
00929         $langpath= '/usr/local/share/dansguardian/languages/';
00930     
00931         $re= "|(http://)($Re_Ip)(/images/comix.png)|m";
00932         $retval=  $this->ReplaceRegexp($langpath.'ukenglish/fancydmtemplate.html', $re, '${1}'.$ip.'${3}');
00933         $retval&= $this->ReplaceRegexp($langpath.'ukenglish/template.html', $re, '${1}'.$ip.'${3}');
00934         $retval&= $this->ReplaceRegexp($langpath.'ukenglish/template_nobypass.html', $re, '${1}'.$ip.'${3}');
00935         $retval&= $this->ReplaceRegexp($langpath.'turkish/fancydmtemplate.html', $re, '${1}'.$ip.'${3}');
00936         $retval&= $this->ReplaceRegexp($langpath.'turkish/template.html', $re, '${1}'.$ip.'${3}');
00937         $retval&= $this->ReplaceRegexp($langpath.'turkish/template_nobypass.html', $re, '${1}'.$ip.'${3}');
00938         
00939         $re= "|(http://)($Re_Ip)(/images/info.png)|m";
00940         $retval&= $this->ReplaceRegexp($langpath.'ukenglish/fancydmtemplate.html', $re, '${1}'.$ip.'${3}');
00941         $retval&= $this->ReplaceRegexp($langpath.'turkish/fancydmtemplate.html', $re, '${1}'.$ip.'${3}');
00942     
00943         
00944         $re= "|(http://)($Re_Ip)(/images/error.png)|m";
00945         $retval&= $this->ReplaceRegexp($langpath.'ukenglish/template.html', $re, '${1}'.$ip.'${3}');
00946         $retval&= $this->ReplaceRegexp($langpath.'ukenglish/template_nobypass.html', $re, '${1}'.$ip.'${3}');
00947         $retval&= $this->ReplaceRegexp($langpath.'turkish/template.html', $re, '${1}'.$ip.'${3}');
00948         $retval&= $this->ReplaceRegexp($langpath.'turkish/template_nobypass.html', $re, '${1}'.$ip.'${3}');
00949 
00950         return $retval;
00951     }
00952 }
